Text: FW EnronOnlines future a proven development group AGENCYCOMHi Greg This email is meant to help you during this time of transition from EnronOnline to Dynegy Since you are swamped these days we here at AGENCYCOM wanted to make a brief contact with you as you transition EnronOnline to Dynegy and offer our assistance and expertise as we have particular knowledge of the systems for the online trading environment AS you may know we designed and built the EnronOnline system for the Philippe Bibi organization under the guidance of Louise Kitchen for the business processes and launched it in Oct We congratulate you on the succeess you have enjoyed with the system And we are still here and would very much like to work with you and the new team as you transition EnronOnline to DynegyOnline I am the executive who put together this original deal with Louise Philippe and know the history which could prove advantageos to your team As we are located in Dallas I can be in Houston to meet with you as appropriate Please let us know if you have any interest in our assistance and domain expertise I look forward to your resonse and to meeting you soon Sincerly Madelon madelon highsmith coover AGENCYCOM office mobile email wwwagencycom
